thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 16 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Dirtt And Iron Compass Agree On Board Refreshment

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Dirtt And Iron Compass Agree On Board Refreshment
text:
April 16 (Reuters) - DIRTT Environmental Solutions Ltd :
* DIRTT AND IRON COMPASS AGREE ON BOARD REFRESHMENT * DIRTT ENVIRONMENTAL SOLUTIONS - AGREED WITH RECOMMENDATIONS PROVIDED BY IRON COMPASS TO ADD JOHN (JACK) ELLIOTT, RONALD KAPLAN TO BOARD
* DIRTT ENVIRONMENTAL SOLUTIONS LTD - IRON COMPASS WITHDRAWS MEETING REQUISITION AND ENTERS INTO SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT WITH DIRTT
* DIRTT - TO IMMEDIATELY ACCOMMODATE APPOINTMENTS, LAWRENCE D. FAIRHOLM RETIRED FROM BOARD, INTERIM CEO GOLDSTEIN TO STEP DOWN AS DIRECTOR
* DIRTT - JOHN ELLIOTT, KAPLAN TO JOIN EXISTING DIRECTORS TODD LILLIBRIDGE AND RICHARD HARAY ON NEWLY-CREATED CEO SEARCH COMMITTEE
* DIRTT ENVIRONMENTAL SOLUTIONS - GOLDSTEIN WILL CONTINUE TO LEAD CO AS INTERIM CEO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
